nodes.text: Axxila was a planet located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that was the homeworld of Imperial Admiral Firmus Piett.

Axxila was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2015 reference book Ultimate Star Wars. Before that, it first appeared in the 1998 Star Wars Legends eight-part story arc Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron: Masquerade from the comic book series Star Wars: X-Wing Rogue Squadron published by Dark Horse Comics.
